greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) is the largest integer of the form 2^k - 1 that divides n.
maple: A161788 := proc(n) for k from ilog2(n+1) to 0 by -1 do if n mod (2^k-1) = 0 then RETURN(2^k-1); fi; od: end: seq(A161788(n),n=1..120) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 27 2009
results.author: _Leroy Quet_, Jun 19 2009
